summary: CPSC:  HARMONY COMFORT BOOSTER SEATS,  AFTER INITIATING USE OF THE BOOSTER SEAT, I BEGAN TO EXPERIENCE BURNING EYES AND HEADACHES. MY GRANDSON COMPLAINED OF A BAD SMELL IN THE CAR. HE, TOO, SAID IT MADE HIM FEEL SICK. I REMOVED THE BOOSTER SEATS FROM BOTH OF MY VEHICLES, AND ALLOWED THEM TO "AIR OUT". THE SMELL HAS CONTINUED, ESPECIALLY NOW THAT THE DAYS ARE WARMER, AND I MUST DRIVE WITH WINDOWS OPEN FOR 5-10 MINUTES. BOOSTER SEATS FROM BOTH OF MY VEHICLES, AND ALLOWED THEM TO "AIR OUT", ON OUR PATIO, FOR A COUPLE OF DAYS. I THEN PLACED THEM BACK IN THE CARS. THE SMELL HAS CONTINUED.  *BF   UPDATED 06/28/2017*JS
